Subject: Major Incident Update: Network Connectivity Issue in Dubai Mall

Major Incident Update: Network Connectivity Issue in Dubai Mall

______________________________________________________________________________

Date: 30-09-2024
Time: 08:00 AM GST

Dear All,

Please be advised that there is a current network outage at Dubai Mall, affecting store connectivity to the group Wi-Fi. 

The technical teams, in collaboration with the mall's maintenance staff, are actively working to resolve the issue. 

If you require any assistance during this timeframe, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting the following link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cffd34a8ae3e54d2da2b508dce118d527%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638632744616854711%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=3hvuXFr94qQfW4I1hHrrZRfdY5kPytS6N0Tx9%2FKvCQI%3D&reserved=0> .
